content.p: School ranks 5th in the World two years in a row!* In the latest global rankings by subject Nottingham ranks 5th in 'Pharmacy and Pharmacology'. It is the 8th consecutive year that we have maintained a top 10 position. This is great recognition of all the efforts of our staff and students and reflects our aspiration to deliver transformational teaching and research that globally impacts on the profession of Pharmacy and the lives of patients through fundamental and applied research in medicines development. For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
